sentences.en: Become the most positive and enthusiastic adman in the Agency.
sentences.cn: 成为公司最积极最热情的广告人.

sentences.en: He was the most brilliant adman that any of us knew.
sentences.cn: 他是我们认识的最有才华的广告人。

sentences.en: The legendary adman James Webb Young did this before.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯传奇修养来做这以前那样年轻.

trans.tran_cn: 广告部门职员，拉广告者
